column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////My boyfriend and I returned for Sunday brunch and were very pleased with our experience here. The specialty mango sangria was incredibly tasty. We split some veggie-friendly dishes such as the potato omelet
column3: and the stuffed mushrooms. Though my boyfriend isn't vegetarian
column4: he thoroughly enjoyed these dishes alongside me. Jane was our server and was very attentive and friendly. We're happy we gave this place a second chance and will likely return.
